page.title: 14Local News (1)
page.content: These extracts are taken from the Wellington Weekly News.The head lines are highlighted. {Improved Christmas Lights.}... for the first time there will be illuminations right across the main street. {Power Cut }Wellington was brought to a standstill for an hour...caused by an explosion at the electricity substation {2 Schools Are Raided}...a quantity of frozen and fresh food valued at Â£50 was stolen from Beech Grove School.Court Fields School's kitchen was also broken into. {Relyon Factory Extensoin Planned. } {Car Maintainance Lessons Popular at {Court Fields School. {Teacher Met Princess }A Canadian teacher who has been working at Court Fields for nine months,Mrs S.Enright, was introduced at a garden party.
